article.title: Air Force Awards Lockheed Martin-Led Team $75 Million Contract Extention
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force has awarded the Lockheed Martin/Northrop Grumman Transformational Satellite Communications System (TSAT) Space Segment Team a $75-million, six-month extension to its Risk Reduction and System Definition (RR&SD) contract.
